column2: The ODMP app contains memorials of the 23,000+ fallen law enforcement officers & 200+ fallen canines, provides line of duty death notifications, provides an interactive statistics dashboard to learn about trends in line of duty deaths, and provides interactive mapping features of where line of duty deaths have occurred in America since 1791.

The Law Enforcement Today App provides complete access to all of our content, the radio show - podcast, website, news, articles, stories, videos, social media and our store. Our app is for Law Enforcement Officers active - retired, their families, friends and supporters.

LawStack's complete New Jersey Law (NJ) in your pocket. Produced by Tekk Innovations LLC, the premier iOS legal reference source. Put down the hardcopy books and buy this app now.
